Sambasa Nzeribe listen (onye a mụrụ Chiedozie Nzeribe Siztus) bụ onye Naijiria na-eme ihe nkiri na telivishọn, nlereanya na onye na-eme ntụrụndụ.listen (help·info)
Ọ si Anambra Steeti nke Naịjirịa.

O gosipụtara n'ọtụtụ ihe nkiri Naijiria na-aga nke ọma, gụnyere A Mile from Home (2013) Out of Luck (2015), Just Not Married (2015), A Soldier's Story (2015), Hotel Choco (2015), The Wedding Party (2016), The Island (2018), Slow Country (2018), Elevator Baby (2019), Kasala (2018) na The Ghost and the Tout (2018).
N'afọ 2016, ọ meriri AMVCA nke abụọ ya n'usoro maka "Onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma na Drama".
Sambasa tolitere n'ọnọdụ siri ike, ebe nna ya nwụnahụrụ ya n'oge
Ọ tolitere na Isolo, Lagos State
Ọ zụlitere mmasị maka ime ihe nkiri mgbe ọ na-etolite, ọ na-arụkwa ọrụ nke ukwuu na ndị ukwe chọọchị na ndị na-eme ihe nkiri.
